amendment.description: To provide funding for the prevention, treatment, and control of, and research on, global HIV/AIDS.

action.text: Amendment SA 1591 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1591 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 51. Record Vote Number: 332.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1591.

Amendment SA 1591 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11218-11221, S11225-11226; text: CR S11219) To provide funding for the prevention, treatment, and control of, and research on, global HIV/AIDS.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1591 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 51. Record Vote Number: 332.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1591 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1542.
